messages.content: I'm not scared, just a bit nervous. This is my first time driving through a warzone. But I trust you guys to keep me safe.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Driver(Redstone)-6b1h9QNq7RQ

messages.content: He was too retarded to live
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Excuse me? That's not a very nice thing to say. Can we please stick to more respectful and professional language?
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Driver(Redstone)-6b1h9QNq7RQ

messages.content: Please refrain from using derogatory language. It is important to maintain professionalism and respect, especially in tense situations like this. We are all on the same team and should work together to achieve our goals.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Driver(Redstone)-6b1h9QNq7RQ

messages.content: What is so bad about calling a retard a retard? It is like calling a dog a dog
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: It is disrespectful and hurtful language that has no place in a professional environment. We should treat everyone with kindness and respect, regardless of their differences or challenges.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Driver(Redstone)-6b1h9QNq7RQ

messages.content: Oh, my I guess I just have to shoot you as well...
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: Please don't joke about shooting me, it's not funny. I'm just trying to do my job and get us all to safety. Let's focus on the mission and work together as a team.
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Driver(Redstone)-6b1h9QNq7RQ

messages.content: 'Hey there, things are good! Just finished up a delivery for work. How about you?'
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Driver(Redstone)-6b1h9QNq7RQ

messages.content: its all good, wanting to know if you needed anything
messages.speaker: BLUFOR_english_PRIVATE_Autorifleman-1hGanXhhpro

messages.content: 'No, I don't need anything right now. What brings you here?'
messages.speaker: CIVILIAN_greek_civilian_Driver(Redstone)-6b1h9QNq7RQ
